Permanent Resident.text: Are you currently residing in the country on a valid visa?
Have you lived here continuously for at least 2 years?
Are you planning to move here within the next 6 months?
Have you maintained a clean legal record?
Are you employed or have a job offer in this country?
Have you taken a language proficiency test (if required)?

Student Visa.text: Have you received an offer letter from an accredited institution?
Do you have the financial means to support your studies?
Are you currently applying to institutions?
Have you taken an accepted language proficiency test?

Work Permit.text: Do you have a job offer from an employer in the country?
Does the employer provide visa sponsorship?
Are you eligible for an open work permit (e.g., spousal or graduate)?
Do you meet the health and background check requirements?
